snippet.title: Michael Trailer #1 (2026)
snippet.description:

► Shop Rotten Tomatoes: http://bit.ly/3KvCU1M
► Download the app: https://bit.ly/4lcQqHs

US Release Date: April 24, 2026
Starring: Colman Domingo, Jaafar Jackson, Miles Teller, Nia Long
Director: Antoine Fuqua
Synopsis: The story of pop superstar Michael Jackson -- from his extraordinary early days in the Jackson 5 to the visionary artist whose creative ambition fuels a relentless pursuit to become the biggest entertainer in the world.

► Learn more: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/michael?cmp=Trailers_YouTube_Desc
